title: Which musician plays the Paganini Caprice 24 best? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s absolutely no contest—Alexander Markov played it best:  It starts out like every violinists version, but as it continues, wow, just wow! He plays it leagues ahead of almost every violinist I’ve heard, and none can compare to his left hand pizzicato! I strongly suggest you listen to this performance. Its not the most musical, but it’s one of the most technically challenging performances I’ve heard.
I like Ruggiero Ricci’s London records version for it’s devilish sounds and stunning technique.
